title: Soul Jacker
description: An ancient evil haunts the slums of Paris... A drug dealer has found a way to spark the flames of rage and revolution by tapping into the powers of the occult. Now the ancient curse of the Jinn has returned to the modern world and threatens its future. Only two people stand in the way of the living nightmare--Detective Samia Ahmed, who must face down police prejudice and her own dark past, and Mark Talon, the Occult Assassin. Will they be able to to stop the wrath of the Soul Jacker before the City of Light descends into darkness?
author: William Massa
